summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of the Alley in Block 15 Denny-Fuhrmain's Addition (from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street between No. Broadway & Howard Avenue No.) in the City of Seattle., by grading and paving under Ordinance No. 23441, creating Local Improvement District No. 2274 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
